data.title: Professional Service with Dignity
data.text:
Cheryl O’Boyle

Barnwell – Cheryl O’boyle, 68, passed away at her home surrounded by family on June 30, 2024. A Celebration of Life will be announced at a later date. Cheryl was born to the late Roy Cunningham and Faye Myers in Maryland. She loved decorating and Christmas shopping. She was a loving mother, grandmother and friend […]

Helen Dyches

Blackville – Helen Dyches, 80, went to be with her Lord and Savior, June 4, 2024, surrounded by family. Funeral services will be held Friday, June 7, 2024 at 11:00 a.m. at Dyches Funeral Home Chapel with Rev. Arnie Shipp officiating. Visitation will be held Thursday, June 6, 2024, from 6-8 p.m. at Dyches Funeral […]

Janie H. Black

Blackville – Janie H. Black, 74, passed away at her home surrounded by family Monday, May 27, 2024. Funeral services will be Saturday, June 1st, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. at Trinity Baptist Church, Barnwell, S.C. with Rev. Romey Martin officiating. Visitation will be held one hour prior to service. Janie was born in Hilda, S.C. […]

Christopher Harold Gleaton

Greenwood – Christopher Harold Gleaton, 34, passed away on May 2, 2024, at Self Regional Hospital, Greenwood, S.C. A Celebration of Life will be announced at a later date. Christopher was born in Greenwood, S.C. on May 17, 1989. Chis never met a stranger and was always offering a helping hand to anyone in need. […]

Francis “Wayne” Bodiford

Barnwell – It is with great sadness that the family of Francis “Wayne” Bodiford, 73, announces his passing after a courageous battle he fought with cancer and now he is rejoicing with his Savior in heaven. Funeral services will be held Saturday, April 27, 2024 at 11 a.m. at Friendship Baptist Church, Barnwell, S.C. with […]

Dr. Earl Furman Sanders

Dr. Earl Furman Sanders, 71, passed away on December 19, 2023. In Ulmer, SC at his home known as the Village of One on Pamasons Farm in Barnwell County. Earl graduated from Walterboro High School in 1970 where he played football, ran track, was a member of the International Relations Club, Biology Club, Science Club, […]

Susan Padgett Kight

Barnwell – Susan Padgett Kight, 58, passed away on January, 2, 2024 at Aiken Regional Medical Center surrounded by family. A Celebration of Life will be held at Dyches Funeral Home Chapel, Barnwell, SC on Friday, January 12, 2024 at 11:00 a.m. officiated by Jessica Kight. The family will receive family and friends after the […]

Phyllis Ann Hutson

Barnwell – Phyllis Ann Hutson, 70, passed away January 8, 2024, surrounded by family. Funeral services will be held Saturday, January 13, 2024 at 11:00 a.m. at Bethany Baptist Church, 9988 Dunbarton Boulevard, Barnwell, S.C. with Rev. Brandon Howard officiating. Burial will follow at Barnwell County Memory Gardens, 2728 Reynolds Road, Barnwell, S.C. The family […]

Sandra Jean Amerson

Loris, SC – Sandra Jean Amerson, 70, passed away December 17, 2023. Funeral services will be announced at a later date. The family has entrusted Dyches Funeral Home and Crematory with the arrangements.
